articles.title: India's fitness standards prove decisive in Asian Champions Trophy title win - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: It was a taxing effort to come back from the brink and win 4-3, especially with the schedule that India have had.
articles.content: India were coming to the end of their 11th game in 18 days. They had landed in Chennai a couple of days before the start of the Asian Champions Trophy. And yet, towards the end of the final, India we… [+3028 chars]
